page.title: 15NEW LONGTON ACTION GROUP
page.content: { New Longton Action Group}was formed to oppose the siting of Longton Riding Club in New Longton. The Club had to move out of premises at the Victory Memorial Playing Fields in Longton and hoped to find another site at New Longton, but the Action Group opposed the planning application. The Riding Club now meets at Hoole. The Action Group is now aiming to force a split from the Longton Parish Council in a campaign for independence to the Local Government Boundaries Commission which will be asked to review the electoral ward boundaries in the hope that{New Longton Council will be formed. Voters are now being asked to sign a petition for a separate council which would control New Longton's rates income. Opponents say that increased wages and admin. costs would outweigh the benefits.
